timeline.bodyText: Can we just call input.getDeclaringClass().getName() here?
timeline.author: robinyqiu

timeline.message: Port PipelineOptionsFactory from Guava Function to java.lang.function.Function
Inline trivial methods with overly strict types from ReflectHelpers
Inline trivial fields with overly-specific types in PipelineOptionsFactory

Convert static Function fields on ReflectHelpers to static methods

Previously, these were Guava Functions. Now they can just be static methods and
use a method reference to use them for any functional interface.

timeline.bodyText: I asked the checkerframework folks for a better solution and they gave it: @KeyFor annotation.
timeline.author: kennknowles
